title: Truth About the Capitol Siege | Guest: Rep. Chris Stewart | 1/7/21
description:
Today, Glenn lets his listeners do most of the talking. But he makes it very clear: There is no excuse for yesterday’s siege of the Capitol, but there are reasons for what happened that we must understand. The rule of law must be applied equally. Listeners who were at the rallies in Washington, D.C., describe feeling like something was off before the chaos started. Glenn argues that America’s REAL capitol was breached long ago. Rep. Chris Stewart gives his unique perspective from inside the Capitol and describes how the riot changed the mood of the Electoral College confirmation. Are sanctuary states for the Constitution the answer? Glenn hears from listeners who disagree with him. Where is your line in the sand?
